summary: This is a court subpoena issued by the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York to The Mar-a-Lago Club in Palm Beach, Florida, commanding it to appear on November 29, 2021, and produce employment records related to the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell. The subpoena is signed by U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, for which employment records are being subpoenaed.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: Signed the subpoena as the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Subpoena Appearance Date
events.description: The Mar-a-Lago Club is commanded to appear in court to testify and produce employment records related to the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

locations: The Mar-a-Lago Club, 1100 South Ocean Boulevard, Palm Beach, Florida 33480
United States District Court for the Southern District of New York, 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906, Borough of Manhattan, City of New York, New York
keyFacts: A subpoena was issued to The Mar-a-Lago Club for employment records related to the Ghislaine Maxwell criminal case.
The subpoena demands appearance and record production on November 29, 2021, at the U.S. District Court in Manhattan.
The subpoena is signed by U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss and dated October 5, 2021.
Failure to comply constitutes contempt of court with civil sanctions and criminal penalties.
The document indicates investigative interest in potential employment connections between Ghislaine Maxwell and The Mar-a-Lago Club.
